_sText:
This is a trial for a single player style Horror Map i am planning out (this is more of a sequence & timing trial, along with fog and lighting)

Its bassed on a silent hill style map

***HOLD SHIFT & WALK THROUGH THE MAP!!!!***
      ***DO NOT RUN THROUGH IT!!!***

its a small section of a map map and took the afternoon to create :) happy with the out come. - I am aware that its a little laggy at the start.
